dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Crosslinked polyethylene; PEX; XLPE; PE-X; Silane-grafted polyethylene; Peroxide crosslinked polyethylene; Electron beam crosslinked polyethylene; PE-c; Engage polyethylene; VLDPEX
Crosslinked polyethylene; PEX; XLPE; PE-X; Silane-grafted polyethylene; Peroxide crosslinked polyethylene; Electron beam crosslinked polyethylene; PE-c; Engage polyethylene; VLDPEX
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Silane cross-linked polyethylene, commonly referred to as PEX or XLPE, is characterized by its enhanced temperature and chemical resistance properties due to the cross-linking process. The product is detailed with its processing level indicating it has undergone silane cross-linking, and it complies with relevant standards. The quality attribute showcases its improved properties over conventional polyethylene. Usage information might include applications in plumbing or cable insulation, while the production route involves grafting silane groups onto polyethylene chains followed by cross-linking. It's provided as part of a production mix, and is available 'at plant' or 'to consumer', depending on distribution stage.
经硅烷交联的聚乙烯，通常称为PEX或XLPE，因交联过程提高了耐温性和化学稳定性。产品处理级别表明其已经过硅烷交联，符合相关标准。品质属性展示了其相较普通聚乙烯的改良特性。使用信息可能包含水管安装或电缆绝缘应用，生产路线涉及在聚乙烯链上嫁接硅烷基团，随后进行交联。它作为生产混合物提供，在分销阶段可在'工厂'或'向消费者'地点获得。
